lead_paragraph: STEINHART--Arthur N.,DPM, died May 24, 2016 after a long illness. He was a well-respected professor in the medicine department of the New York College of Podiatric Medicine for more than 30 years, loved and respected by students, staff and patients. A man of many interests and talents, he began making his own craft beers, wines, and specialty breads and cakes under the name "Doc and Family Basement Brewers." He leaves behind a family devastated by his loss, his wife Susan, his sons Joshua and Shawn, Shawn's partner Luke, daughter-in-law Jessie, and grandson Lyle. His sister Joyce predeceased him. His life was devoted to helping others. He will be sorely missed by family, friends and all who knew him. 1/3
